author: dkhaywood
msg: More tidying up of the AbstractValueAdapters ... split out primitive vs wrappers, multi-typed facets; reinstated boolean adapter (though still not working correctly in the UI); idea of a no-op facet and alwaysReplace()ing facets; adapter facets can optionally provide property defaults; the OneToOneAssociationImpl#toDefault looks for these PropertyDefaultFacets on the NOSpec if none found on the reference itself; now sets up defaults using initAssociation (ie the setXxx method) rather than setAssociation (ie the modifyXxx method).

author: dkhaywood
msg: Added @Facets, @FacetFactoryName, @FacetFactoryClass and removed @Value, @NewValue; we now "dog-food" the NO "value" types using @Facets annotation.
